content.question: How the court will contact you
content.communicateParagraph1: You need to agree to receive emails about the divorce to use the online service. Your email address will not be shared with your {{divorceWho}}.
content.communicateParagraph2: Your emails will be sent to:
content.communicateParagraph3: Provide a phone number to let court staff contact you more quickly. Your phone number will not be shared with your {{divorceWho}}.
content.petitionerConsent: I agree that the divorce centre can send me notifications and deliver (serve) court documents to me by email.
content.somePost: You may need to receive some correspondence by post.
content.contactDetailsNotShare: Your address will not be shared with your {{divorceWho}} as you've asked for it to be kept private. If you use adultery as your reason for divorce, this address will also not be shared with the co-respondent (if you choose to name them).
content.contactDetailsShare: Your address will be shared with your {{divorceWho}}  as you’ve not asked for it to be kept private. If you use adultery as your reason for divorce, this address will also be shared with the co-respondent (if you choose to name them).

petitionerPhoneNumber.invalid: Enter a valid telephone number. Telephone number must be a minimum length of 9 and can only contain the numbers 0-9 and the symbols +, - , ( , ) , .

petitionerConsent.required: You must agree to receive notifications and court documents by email to use this service.

content.question: Sut fydd y llys yn cysylltu â chi?
content.communicateParagraph1: Bydd angen ichi gytuno i dderbyn negeseuon e-bost am yr ysgariad i ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth ar-lein. Ni fyddwn yn rhannu eich cyfeiriad e-bost gyda’ch {{divorceWho}}.
content.communicateParagraph3: Darparwch rif ffôn er mwyn i staff y llys allu cysylltu â chi yn gynt. Ni fyddwn yn rhannu eich rhif ffôn gyda’ch {{divorceWho}}.
content.petitionerConsent: Rwy’n cydsynio i’r ganolfan ysgaru anfon hysbysiadau ataf a chyflwyno dogfennau’r llys imi drwy e-bost.
content.somePost: Efallai y bydd angen ichi dderbyn peth gohebiaeth drwy’r post.
content.contactDetailsNotShare: Ni fyddwn yn rhannu eich cyfeiriad gyda’ch {{divorceWho}} gan eich bod wedi gofyn inni ei gadw’n breifat. Os ydych yn defnyddio godineb yn rheswm dros ysgaru, ni fyddwn yn rhannu’r cyfeiriad gyda’r cyd-atebydd (os byddwch yn dewis ei (h)enwi).
content.contactDetailsShare: Byddwn yn rhannu eich cyfeiriad gyda’ch {{divorceWho}} gan nad ydych wedi gofyn inni ei gadw’n breifat. Os ydych yn defnyddio godineb yn rheswm dros ysgaru, byddwn yn rhannu’r cyfeiriad gyda’r cyd-atebydd hefyd (os byddwch yn dewis ei (h)enwi).

petitionerPhoneNumber.invalid: Rhowch rif ffôn dilys. Rhaid i rifau ffôn gynnwys o leiaf 9 rhif ac nid ddylent gynnwys unrhyw symbolau ac eithrio’r rhifau 0-9 a’r symbolau +, - , ( , ) , .

petitionerConsent.required: Rhaid ichi gydsynio i dderbyn hysbysiadau a dogfennau’r llys drwy e-bost i ddefnyddio’r gwasanaeth hwn.
